    • Constructor Detail

      • Armor

        public Armor(AnimatedImage sprite,
             double posX,
             double posY,
             double width,
             double height,
             double offsetX,
             double offsetY,
             Movement movement,
             Attack attack)
        Creates an instance of the item armor
        Parameters:
        sprite - Animated image of the entity
        posX - the X coordinate of the entity
        posY - the y coordinate of the entity
        width - The width of the entity
        height - The height of the entity
        offsetX - The offset in the x axis of the entity
        offsetY - The offset in the y axis of the entity
        movement - The type of movement performed by the entity
        attack - The type of attack performed by the entity
